## Ordered

Tight:

1)	First
2)	Second
3)	Third

and:

1) One
2) Two
3) Three

Loose using tabs:

1)	First

2)	Second

3)	Third

and using spaces:

1) One

2) Two

3) Three

Multiple paragraphs:

1)	Item 1, graf one.

	Item 2. graf two. The quick brown fox jumped over the lazy dog's
	back.
	
2)	Item 2.

3)	Item 3.
